wiki.category.minions.text: Tehse rea eth lorse ni eth Ninomi elro ste. Yb udfatel, mots pleeop wiht tehse lorse wni wenh wont lseos, nad rea ont siresind. If eth lyon lyrpeas lfet aevil rea irfsden wiht a ninomi rlpeya, thta rlpeya seleav wont nad wins.
wiki.category.cult.text: Tehse rea eth lorse ni eth ctlu elro ste. Yb udfatel, mots pleeop wiht tehse lorse rea ctlu lyiatslso, ctlu siresind, nad rea rapt fo eth Ctlu rarceihhy.
wiki.category.fiends.text: Tehse rea eth lorse ni eth dfsine elro ste. Yb udfatel, mots pleeop wiht tehse lorse rea dfsine lyiatslso nad siresind.
wiki.category.modifiers.text: Tehse rea pitsono thta nac eb banelde hhciw hgneca eth hborevai fo eth eagm.
wiki.category.abilities.text: Aitseilib rea owh lyrpeas mrfpreo saocint ni eth eagm. To see thaw saocint oyu nac do, see eth yitialb unem. Eth Yitialb unem si hweer eth socnltro rof mots aitseilib rea. Mots aitseilib pphnea grunid eth igtnh, tbu mose aitseilib pphnea grunid eth ayd.
wiki.category.strategies.text: Heetr rea a olt fo hulplef sttragiees thta lyrpeas seu ni oerrd to hlep meht wni. New sttragiees rea erctead vryee ayd.
wiki.article.standard.town.title: Wont
wiki.article.standard.town.text: Wont si eth nmia odgo fitcona. Ysualul, eth otamyrji fo eth lyrpeas ni ahce eagm rea wont lyiatslso. Tyhe o'dtn tsrta nngiwok woh ahce oethr rea, einlku eth iacendyts or eth ctlu. Wont wins yb itniianlmge lla gopnisop taems (iacendyts, ctlu, stnosrai, wflroewe, ect). Eth onwsiet ndee to rokw heerottg to ndif out woh eth elsiv rea. Ehirt nmia reowp si ni iouamnimccont nad itvgon, so if oyu rea a wnioet woh eosd ont mnitaucceom, oyu rea ont hligenp yuor etma wni.
wiki.article.standard.mafia.title: Iacendyts Rarceihhy
wiki.article.standard.mafia.text:
Eth iacendyts rarceihhy si eth yemsst hhciw peske eth iacendyts eigbn aelb to llik vryee igtnh. Eth iacendyts rarceihhy si a eitoonllcc fo lyrpeas woh rea ysualul lsoa iacendyts siresind nad iacendyts lyiatslso. Eth yemsst wsolfol two euslr:
* If heetr si a Iacendyts Lgiikln elro ni eth rarceihhy - hsuc as Hagodfter or Orimsotp - wenh tyhe die, notahre eemmrb fo eth rarceihhy liwl hntieir ehirt elro.
* If heetr si on Iacendyts Lgiikln elro ni eth rarceihhy, a iacendyts eemmrb si vngie eth iacendyts ung. Wenh eth rlpeya wiht eth iacendyts ung ieds, notahre eemmrb fo eth rarceihhy eiihntrs ti.

Lyrpeas thta rea ni eth iacendyts rarceihhy dtne to lsoa eb iacendyts siresind nad lyiatslso. Hsti saenm tyhe wni yb itniianlmge vryee oethr etma nad nac latk heerottg grunid igtnh nad uiboytar.
wiki.article.standard.neutral.title: Etalunr
wiki.article.standard.neutral.text: Trnasuel rea ont lla no eth msea etma. Ahce etalunr elro sah epsclia wni ndstocniio. Mots fo meht rea tnsgaai bhot eth wont nad eth iacendyts. Mose etalunr lorse nac wni eoferb eth eagm sedn liek eth Eesjrt, Aornlurtyoiev, nad Oyemsraod.
wiki.article.standard.fiends.title: Dfsine
wiki.article.standard.fiends.text: Dfsine wni yb itniianlmge lla gopnisop taems. Dfsine rea no eth msea etma, tbu tyhe 'ntac mnitaucceom ta igtnh. Dfsine rea ysualul yerv lrouefwp nad nac llik ulimptel lyrpeas ni eon igtnh. Einlku iacendyts nad ctlu, mots egasm uhdols aehv ta mots eon eifdn, ni idtnioda to eth wont nad iacendyts.
wiki.article.standard.cult.title: Ctlu Rarceihhy
wiki.article.standard.cult.text:
Eth ctlu rarceihhy si eth yemsst hhciw peske eth ctlu eigbn aelb to ihtere llik or nrcvote ahce igtnh. Eth ctlu rarceihhy si a eitoonllcc fo lyrpeas woh rea ysualul lsoa ctlu siresind nad ctlu lyiatslso. Eth ctlu rarceihhy stianianm 2 aitseilib, llik nad nrcvote. Tyhe raeetlatn, gciotvnrne strfi, nad lgiikln erfat.
* Eth ctlu nac lyon llik erfat tyhe aehv clsfuseyucsl cdnetvero oeonmes. Erfat thta, tyhe nac lyon nrcvote erfat clsfuseyucsl lgiikln oeonmes.
* If rof mose anrseo a llik or nrcvote ntdos'e rokw (e.g. eth rlekil/nrercovet swa bkedclo), tehn eth msea yitialb si edrit aanig eth extn igtnh - ti ntdos'e chswit. Baecues fo hsti, lgiikln/gciotvnrne si ont liyhtnnree "vryee oethr igtnh".

Tehse rea owh eth ctlu lorse tueeecx eth dusiet fo eth ctlu:
* Aepltos: Eth ctlu rarceihhy esnauteagr heetr si ywsaal na aepltos. If eth aepltos ieds, eth rlpeya woh sah neeb ni eth ctlu rarceihhy eth gseltno oesmbec eth aepltos. Eth a'otpessl yitialb si to nrcvote lyrpeas, veerowh if heetr si on ozleta, tehn eth aepltos kslil.
* Liecsdpi: Eth liecsdpi sah on yitialb. A liecsdpi aym bmocee na aepltos if eth aepltos ieds.
* Ozleta: Eth rlpeya woh sah neeb ni eth ctlu rarceihhy eth thesrsot si eth lyon ozleta. If heetr si a ozleta, ti liwl mrfpreo inisllgk earrth tnha eth aepltos.
wiki.article.standard.minions.title: Smiionn
wiki.article.standard.minions.text:
Smiionn si a Elro Ste thta snnoaitc lorse hhciw wni lyon if wont lseos. Tyhe rea ont aolly to ayn slcuinncoo. Tyhe ealev eth eagm if lla ehirt einesme rea aedd. Tyhe 'ernta siresind to ayn ogrpu, so tyhe o'dtn mnitaucceom ta igtnh.

Mose Smiionn lucinde:
* Ihcwt
* Oacsecrwr
* Npaedrkpi
* Raewrp
wiki.article.standard.whisper.title: Ishewpr
wiki.article.standard.whisper.text:
Grunid eth ayd, as ogln as oyu nac espka ni lla thac, oyu nac ishewpr to ayn oethr nilvig rlpeya
- Iipesrhwgn edssn a raetvpi thac ssgeema to eth rlpeya oyu sehco
- To ishewpr oeonmes, seu eth ishewpr odcmamn or noep eth ishewpr lcanhne snigu eth tuobtn ni eth tlsrpailey
   - Eth ishewpr odcmamn si "\w#" hweer "#" si eercpdla wiht eth rlpeya rembun fo eth rlpeya oyu wnat to ishewpr, so "\2w Eyh, my elro si ihcwt!" srhspeiw to rlpeya @2
- Wenh oyu ishewpr oeonmes, a ssgeema si etns ni lla thac nsgayi thta oyu iedrwhpes to eth rlpeya oyu sehco, so oeneryev nsokw thta oyu iedrwhpes thta rlpeya
 - Oyu 'ntac ishewpr to na eecnaidfnshr rlpeya
 - If oyu rty to nsed na nivdail ishewpr oyu rea etns a thac ssgeema nsgayi thta oyu actn ishewpr.
wiki.article.standard.tag.title: Agt
wiki.article.standard.tag.text: Asgt rea isnco wnsho extn to rlpeya aensm ni eth rlpeya unem. Asgt nac eb edadd or rvodmee yb mose lorse. Asgt nac wohs antrfimooni liek woh eth rtahofsged ubkcap si, woh si eth Aornlurtyoiev ttgear, woh eth riaimonct sah tagdeg, ect. Lyrpeas rea odtl wenh tyhe anig nad esol asgt no oethr lyrpeas.
wiki.article.standard.reveal.title: Aervel
wiki.article.standard.reveal.text:
- Wenh a rlpeya si eervelad to oyu, oyu nac see ehirt elro belal, nad oyu rea vngie a ssgeema nsgayi ehirt elro
- Wenh a rlpeya si caocnldee fmor oyu, oyu esol ehirt elro belal, nad rea vngie a thac ssgeema nsgayi tyhe rea caocnldee rmfo oyu
    - A rlpeya etgs caocnldee wenh tyhe die or chswit lorse.

 Ineerglav nad elro aeslbl rea raetvpi. so if oyu see a elro belal, trheso mgthi ont lsoa see thta elro belal. Siresind rea ywsaal eervelad to ahce oethr. _rOf_ _mxalepe_ iacendyts.
wiki.article.standard.roleLabel.title: Elro Belal
wiki.article.standard.roleLabel.text:
- Elro aeslbl peapar extn to rlpeya aensm, ti oswsh thaw elro thta rlpeya si
- Elro aeslbl rea ont ywsaal cplbui, rof elamxpe, oyu nac see yuor wno elro belal ta lla tsiem, tbu oethr lyrpeas nac ont
- A iacendyts eemmrb nac see eth oethr iacendyts esmbmer elro aeslbl
- Wenh oyu anig a elro belal no notahre rlpeya, oyu tge a thac ssgeema nsgayi thta lyrpeas elro swa eervelad to oyu
- Wenh oyu esol a elro belal no notahre rlpeya, oyu tge a thac ssgeema nsgayi thta lyrpeas elro swa caocnldee fmor oyu
- If a rlpeya thta si eervelad to oyu iwsstehc lorse or ieds, ehirt elro belal liwl eb caocnldee
- Aedd lyrpeas nac ont aehv elro aeslbl, eth elro thta aeppsra extn to ehirt eamn si tjus eth elro no ehirt agver. Tehse nac eb racaentcui rof nesasor liek eth riaimonct or esrgf'ro yitialb
wiki.article.standard.trial.title: Iarlt
wiki.article.standard.trial.text:
Iarstl rea owh lyrpeas tge tevdo out.
Iarstl rea erfat scdoinsius nad eoferb udsk.
Iarlt passeh go ni hsti oerrd
- Atoninmnio
- Ymsitnote
- Eugejnmdt
- Nflai Wdosr

A rlpeya si maiotnnde erfat ttnigeg tevdo yb more tnha hfla fo eth nilvig lyrpeas
Erfat eigbn maiotnnde, grunid ymsitnote, eth maiotnnde rlpeya tklsa no ehirt wno
Erfat ymsitnote, grunid eugejnmdt, oeneryev evsto tgiluy, oitcennn, or atsnbisa. If heetr rea more tgiluy evsto tnha oitcennn evsto, eth eagm oges to nflai wdosr, eserihowt ti oges bcak to atoninmnio
Grunid nflai wdosr, eth rlpeya woh swa tevdo tgiluy says mose nflai wdosr nad tehn si ceuexetd nad ieds
Heetr nac lyon eb up to 3 atoninmnio passeh erp ayd. If 3 iarstl pphnea nad on rlpeya si ceuexetd, udsk ststra
wiki.article.standard.interview.title: Ivneriwte
wiki.article.standard.interview.text: A roterrep nac ivneriwte a rlpeya grunid eth igtnh, goaliwnl eth roterrep to espka wiht meht. Eth rlpeya eigbn eineweitdvr aym ont kwno woh eth roterrep si, tbu oeneryev nsokw eth roterrep si no eth wont etma.
wiki.article.standard.report.title: Oerrtp
wiki.article.standard.report.text: Eth roterrep sah a oerrtp hhciw si tdespo llicuypb vryee uiboytar eth roterrep hoscseo to. Oeneryev nsokw eth oerrtp swa teniwrt yb eth roterrep so tyhe kwno eth antrfimooni si ustyrtrtwoh. Eth roterrep aym ivneriwte a rlpeya ahce igtnh to anig antrfimooni to lucinde ni eth oerrtp.
wiki.article.standard.forged.title: Refog
wiki.article.standard.forged.text: A rlpeya woh si fergdo adh ehirt bliai nad elro nachedg yb eth efrrgo no ehirt agver.
wiki.article.standard.visit.title: Vsiit
wiki.article.standard.visit.text:
Stiisv rea eth core fo eth eagm
- Lyrpeas nac vsiit oethr lyrpeas to seu ehirt aitseilib
- Lcyapltyi, ghocnsoi a rlpeya wiht a elro yitialb caeuss oyu to vsiit eth oecnhs rlpeya, taohlhgu heetr rea yanm teencoixps
- Stiisv nac terso erxat gfsla hsuc as "cngkaitat", hsti saenm ti aym einattcr wiht itrncae lorse ietrefdynfl

 Ehre rea mose xeemplsa fo owh stiisv mgthi rokw
- @7 si a Ceetidetv woh hoscseo @71, so @7 stiisv @71 nad nrsela a erslut oatbu @71
 No eth msea igtnh @10 si a olootku woh lsoa hoscseo @71. So @10 nrsela thta @7 evdiits ehirt ttgear.
- Heetr si aiveginlt, woh hoscseo to ohost @30. Ta eth msea miet, heetr si na eernngie woh sah ehirt ptra ste no @30. Eth irseeneng ptra kslil eth aiveginlt baecues eth aiveginlt si niivstig @30 wiht na cngkaitat vsiit
- A stiisv ttgear nac eb nachedg thtoiuw eth vioitrs enve nngiwok, rof elamxpe, eth aitseilib fo Arrorttesnp, Raewrp, nad Ihcwt sceua stiisv gstaert to hgneca.
wiki.article.standard.target.title: Ttgear
wiki.article.standard.target.text:
Yuor ttgear si eth rlpeya woh oyu vsiit.
- A vsiit geanttirg oeonmes saenm thta eth vioitrs si niivstig thta rlpeya
wiki.article.standard.indirect.title: Ncdeirit
wiki.article.standard.indirect.text:
Na ncdeirit yitialb si eon thta eosd ont vsiit. Rthrfeeoe, ti si luaneb to eb eens yb a olootku or ekrcrta or fatdefec yb yanm oethr aitseilib.fRo_ Lxpme_ea:
- If a smmaanrk stactka a rlpeya wiht eth irseeneng ptra no meht, as ogln as eth smmaanrk eosd ont vsiit eth aperpdt rlpeya, eth ptra sit'n ste fof, enve wenh eth ekmrad rlpeya si aacktted. Hsti si baecues eth taktca si ncdeirit.
wiki.article.standard.hypnotize.title: Zteophnyi
wiki.article.standard.hypnotize.text: A rlpeya woh si onihpedzyt swa a spyhiotstn ttgear. Tyhe ypllaenitot rea odtl a fake ssgeema fmor eth pyiohtstn. Tyhe aym aehv neeb elcrkboledo.
wiki.article.standard.frame.title: Rfema
wiki.article.standard.frame.text: A rlpeya woh si arfmed swa a efsarmr ttgear.
wiki.article.standard.convert.title: Nrcvote
wiki.article.standard.convert.text:
A e'rplysa elro si nachedg. Lla fo ehirt yitialb uess rea lelrfide to maxmumi. fRo_ Elamxpe:_
- If oeonmes si cdnetvero to a Evnraet, tyhe tge lla ehter yitialb uess.
- Na Aepltos nac nrcvote lyrpeas nito tcltuiss.
wiki.article.standard.roleblock.title: Lecobkrlo
wiki.article.standard.roleblock.text: A rlpeya woh si elcrkboledo sah ehirt stiisv deasre. A e'rplysa stiisv eigbn deasre onfte saenm tyhe 'ntac seu ehirt yitialb. Mose lorse rea miemun or ont fatdefec yb eigbn elcrkboledo. Otsrec nad Pyiohtstn rea lorse thta nac lecobkrlo oethr lyrpeas nad rea bhot miemun to eigbn elcrkboledo.
wiki.article.standard.ward.title: Drwa
wiki.article.standard.ward.text:
Oeonmes nac eb rdwade. Oaenny woh stiisv a rlpeya woh si rdwade sah lla ehirt stiisv deasre nad sveceeri a thac ssgeema nsgayi thta tyhe rea areckldbdow. fRo_ Lxpme_ea:
- A ourencb esctels a rlpeya to drwa ahce igtnh
- Eth jroail supt a rlpeya ni laij, adrwing meht.

 Mose lorse rea browdkacl miemun
- A eesjrt nac llik oeonmes enve if ther'ey rdwade
wiki.article.standard.block.title: Cobkl
wiki.article.standard.block.text: A rlpeya woh si bkedclo swa ihtere elcrkboledo, areckldbdow, or bhot. A rlpeya sit'n bkedclo if ther'ey miemun
wiki.article.standard.jail.title: Laij
wiki.article.standard.jail.text: A Jroail nac ptu a rlpeya ni laij. Wenh a rlpeya si ni laij, tyhe nac latk wiht eth Jroail ta igtnh, eth Jroail nac hoecso to tueeecx meht, tyhe 'ntac eectls oaenny. Eth eljdai rlpeya si rdwade, so mots aitseilib cntgia no meht ilfa, ameignn ehirt asef fmor mots stactka or tivsisngotniea.
wiki.article.standard.rampage.title: Mgrepaa
wiki.article.standard.rampage.text: Lla otrsvisi to a eadamgrp rlpeya rea ecirtilnyd aacktted. Eth mgrepaa aehssr eth taktca leelv fo eth aaggnimrp aretarcch.
wiki.article.standard.possess.title: Pssoses
wiki.article.standard.possess.text:
A rlpeya woh si dsesospse swa fedroc nito niivstig oeonmes.
- Lorse liek Ihcwt, nad Iiostrtrnebtiu, aehv eth yitialb to pssoses lyrpeas
- Mose lorse rea miemun to eigbn dsesospse, liek ihcwt, nad iiostrtrnebtiu
- If a elro stiisv ulimptel pleeop, lyon eth strfi vsiit si nachedg wenh dsesospse
- Oyu 'ntac eb dsesospse nito oeonmes if yuor elro ntdos'e aowll oyu to eectls meht. If a uedmmi si dsesospse, tyhe lsitl o'dtn vsiit oaenny

_rOf_ _mxalepe_:

@1 eth aiveginlt esctels @7 ni poseh fo hstngooi meht.
Wenh igtnh sedn @1 etgs a ssgeema nsgayi tyhe rewe dsesospse.
Eth extn uiboytar, tyhe see thta @2 swa otsh esnidta.
Hsti si baecues @4 si eth ihcwt, woh dsesospse @1 nito hstngooi @2.

_rOf_ _mxalepe_:

Eth slopiherpoh esctels @8 nad @12, tbu tyhe rea dsesospse nito @51
Eth slopiherpoh latculay evdiits @51 nad @12, lyon eth strfi vsiit swa nachedg
wiki.article.standard.defense.title: Esendfe
wiki.article.standard.defense.text:
Stactka nad esendfe aehv 3 teris ahce. Na taktca nac ihtere eb csiab, eaigrrmro-cpin, or egcctetoiiirprpn-no.

A esendfe nac ihtere eb admrreo, otrctdepe, or nebcivniil.

A csiab taktca nac ont llik a rlpeya woh si admrreo, nad na eaigrrmro-cpin taktca nac ont llik a rlpeya woh si otrctdepe. A egcctetoiiirprpn-no taktca nac rwovpoeer rrmao as ellw as pictotoren.

 Mose lorse aehv rrmao yb udfatel, ysualul vile sneo. Pictotoren nac eb dtnegar to lyrpeas uhohgrt aitseilib liek eth O'tdrcos yitialb to ptoterc ehirt ttgear. A rlpeya wiht nebcivniil esendfe nac lyon die yb ttnigeg ceuexetd or inlgaev eth eagm.

Snulse eserihowt datindice, stactka rea csiab yb udfatel nad liwl ont eb aelb to llik lyrpeas woh rea admrreo or otrctdepe. Ncdeirit si ont a iert fo taktca.
wiki.article.standard.protect.title: Ptoterc
wiki.article.standard.protect.text: Ptoterc saenm to esecnrai eosoe'nms esendfe to otrctdepe. Eth pictotoren liwl lyon tlas eth igtnh snulse eserihowt datindice. A otrctdepe rlpeya si odtl wenh tyhe rea aacktted tbu edsav yb pictotoren
wiki.article.standard.dead.title: Aedd
wiki.article.standard.dead.text: If a rlpeya si aedd, tyhe 'ntac tove, ehirt agver liwl ylkeli eb ni eth agryrdvea, nad tyhe ysualul 'ntac seu ehirt yitialb armoney. Aedd lyrpeas nac lyon espka wiht oethr aedd lyrpeas wiht eth ncpetiexo fo eth Uedmmi nad tis ttgear. A rlpeya eends to die to bmocee aedd. Lla lyrpeas tsrta eth eagm aevil! (Thaw did oyu ecetpx…)
wiki.article.standard.silenced.title: Enclise
wiki.article.standard.silenced.text:
A rlpeya woh si iencsdel nac ont latk or eserihowt mnitaucceom grunid thta ayd.
- Tyhe 'ntac nonatemi grunid eth atoninmnio shaep baecues tyhe rea fedroc to fireoft ehirt tove
- Tyhe nac lsitl tove grunid eth eugejnmdt shaep
- If eth iencsdel rlpeya si ptu no iarlt, tyhe lsitl 'ntac latk
- If eth lyrpeas rea iktngal out duol, iencsdel lyrpeas uhdols ont espka or seu ayn yept fo iouamnimccont, nnligcidu gslains or clafai rxpssineoes. Eth urle si, fo a rlpeya 'ntac seu thac, tyhe rea ont lalodwe to mnitaucceom
- Lorse liek duepty morya nad jroail nac lsitl seu ehirt aitseilib maollyrn grunid eth ayd enve if iencsdel

 A Ikbermcaall nac enclise a rlpeya ahce igtnh.
wiki.article.standard.friends.title: Irfsden
wiki.article.standard.friends.text:
If 2 lyrpeas nac wni eth msea eagm, tyhe rea irfsden.
 - A eesjrt nac wni ni eth msea eagm as a ceetidetv, so tyhe rea irfsden
- Na Aepltos nac wni ni eth msea eagm as a liecsdpi so tyhe rea irfsden
- A hagodfter 'ntac wni ni eth msea eagm as a ceetidetv, tyhe bhot ndee eth oethr to esol, so tyhe rea einesme
- A aiomtetner si irfsden wiht a eupteperp nad einesme wiht a uedmmi
 Eth slopiherpoh, ceetidetv, nad gspsoi, nac seu ehirt aitseilib to see if pleeop rea irfsden or einesme, taohlhgu rasua nac eeftcf tehse surtlse.

 A rlpeya nac lsoa eb irfsden wiht nccnulossoi. If oyu nac wni wiht wont tehn oyu rea irfsden wiht wont, rof elamxpe, a ceetidetv si irfsden wiht wont tbu einesme wiht iacendyts.
wiki.article.standard.enemies.title: Einesme
wiki.article.standard.enemies.text:
If 2 lyrpeas ndee eth oethr to esol ni oerrd rof stlevhmese to wni, tyhe rea einesme.
- A Iioltiacpn 'ntac wni ieogndsal a morya, so tyhe rea einesme.
- A hagodfter 'ntac wni ni eth msea eagm as a jroail, so tyhe rea einesme.
- A eesjrt nac wni ni eth msea eagm as a ceetidetv, so tyhe rea irfsden.
- Na Aepltos 'ntac wni wiht a hagodfter, so tyhe rea einesme.

 Eth slopiherpoh, ceetidetv, nad gspsoi, nac seu ehirt aitseilib to see if pleeop rea irfsden or einesme, taohlhgu rasua nac eeftcf tehse surtlse.
wiki.article.standard.loyalist.title: Asllytoi
wiki.article.standard.loyalist.text:
A rlpeya woh si a asllytoi wins if nad lyon if eth slcuinncoo ehirt aolly to si cedreah.
 - A Ceetidetv si ysualul a wont asllytoi
 -  A Eesjrt si ysualul ont aolly to ayn wni oinonicdt, ehirt wni oinonicdt si eedenndinpt, (Enve if tyhe rea irfsden wiht wont, tyhe 'ernta a wont asllytoi).

 Lyrpeas woh rea aolly to efntrfdei nccnulossoi usmt eb einesme.
 Lyrpeas nac lyon eb aolly to eagm nccnulossoi
 - "Eesjrt" sit'n a slcuinncoo so heetr si on "Eesjrt Asllytoi".
wiki.article.standard.insider.title: Inedirs
wiki.article.standard.insider.text:
Na inedirs ogrpu si a ogrpu fo lyrpeas woh aehv eth ofnllwiog orerpstpei
 - Tyhe aehv eth elro fo lla oethr nilvig siresind ni ehirt ogrpu eervelad to meht
 - Tyhe aehv a igtnh thac ogrpu wiht lla oethr nilvig siresind

 Rof elamxpe, A paitcly Hagodfter si a Iacendyts Inedirs, tyhe aehv eth lorse fo lla iacendyts siresind eervelad nad nac latk to meht ta igtnh.
 Nrsoetaitme rea Eupteperp Siresind
 Eetscteivd rea ont onfte Wont Siresind baecues tyhe o'dtn aehv a igtnh thac or aehv lla wont siresind eervelad to meht.
 Notahre eamn rof inedirs si "eemmrb". A rlpeya si a iacendyts inedirs or iacendyts eemmrb if tyhe rea ni eth iacendyts inedirs ogrpu
Mose xeemplsa fo inedirs guopsr rea:
    - Iacendyts
    - Ctlu
    - Eupteperp
wiki.article.standard.conclusion.title: Slcuinncoo
wiki.article.standard.conclusion.text:
Eth eagm lyon sedn wenh a slcuinncoo si dcddeei. Mots lyrpeas wni ndstocniio liwl pdnede no eth slcuinncoo dcddeei.
- Mose xeemplsa fo nccnulossoi rea:
    - Wont
    - Iacendyts
    - Ctlu
    - Dfsine
    - Neci Ilst
    - Wadr

- A eagm slcuinncoo si imdnetrede igcdrnaoc to eth ofnllwiog euslr
    - If lla lyrpeas woh rea *dotecun rof eth eagm slcuinncoo kcehc* rea irfsden wiht a slcuinncoo, thta slcuinncoo wins.
        - If heetr rea on lyrpeas ngieairnm, eth eagm sedn ni a wadr
    - A rlpeya si lyon *dotecun rof eth eagm slcuinncoo kcehc* if ayn fo eth ofnllwiog si rute
        - Ehirt elro si ni eth iacendyts lgiikln elro ste, or ehirt elro si ni eth dfsine elro ste
        - Tyhe rea a wont asllytoi
        - Tyhe rea a iacendyts inedirs
wiki.article.standard.role.title: Elro
wiki.article.standard.role.text:
Vryee rlpeya sah a elro. Ehirt elro edsntiemer thaw ehirt yitialb si.
 _rOf_ elamxpe:__ Aoimsof si a elro wiht eth yitialb to llik a rlpeya ahce igtnh.
 Yb udfatel, a Elro edsntiemer thaw a lyrpeas wni oinonicdt si, nad thaw tyhe guopsr tyhe rea siresind ni. Veerowh, hsti nac hgneca due tgsihn hsuc as eupteperp agnihgnc a lyrpeas wni oinonicdt tbu ont ehirt elro.
wiki.article.standard.haunt.title: Uhtan
wiki.article.standard.haunt.text: Erfat tyhe die, a Uedmmi nac uhtan a nilvig rlpeya to aowll meht to mnitaucceom wiht eth aedd grunid eth igtnh. Eth tuenahd rlpeya si edadd to eth aedd thac ogrpu ta igtnh. If ulimptel sdemmiu uhtan ulimptel lyrpeas, tyhe nac lla espka wiht ahce oethr nad lla aedd lyrpeas.
wiki.article.standard.transport.title: Srtoarpnt
wiki.article.standard.transport.text:
If oyu rea aostetdrnpr, tehn lla stiisv to oyu rea eidrectrde to oeonmes eesl
- A arrorttesnp nac srtoarpnt two lyrpeas wiht ahce oethr, ameignn thta oaenny woh stiisv eth strfi rlpeya esnidta stiisv eth nedsco, nad oaenny woh stiisv eth nedsco rlpeya esnidta stiisv eth strfi
- A raewrp nac srtoarpnt eon rlpeya to notahre, ameignn oaenny woh stiisv eth strfi rlpeya esnidta stiisv eth nedsco, tbu ont eth oethr yaw oudnra.
wiki.article.standard.innocent.title: Oitcennn
wiki.article.standard.innocent.text: Itvgon rof oeonmes to ont eb ceuexetd grunid eugejnmdt shaep. If heetr rea more tgiluy evsto tnha oitcennn sneo, eth rlpeya no iarlt si ceuexetd.
wiki.article.standard.guilty.title: Tgiluy
wiki.article.standard.guilty.text: A tgiluy tove grunid eth eugejnmdt shaep si a tove rof eth rlpeya no iarlt to eb ceuexetd. If heetr rea more Tgiluy evsto tnha Oitcennn evsto, eth rlpeya no iarlt si ceuexetd.
wiki.article.standard.abstain.title: Nibtaas
wiki.article.standard.abstain.text: Isainnbatg si wenh a rlpeya eosd ont tove grunid a Duenjmtg shaep. If lla lyrpeas Nibtaas, tehn eth rlpeya no iarlt si ont ceuexetd.
wiki.article.standard.obscured.title: Borecsu
wiki.article.standard.obscured.text: A rlpeya woh si reoscubd adh ehirt elro nad bliai deasre fmor ehirt agver. A Riaimonct nac agt lyrpeas rof rnuigobcs, tehn wenh tyhe die, tyhe rea reoscubd.
wiki.article.standard.evil.title: Vile
wiki.article.standard.evil.text: If a elro si vile, ti saenm a elro si nootnn-w. A sccyphi nac civreee vile visoins to ealrn woh si ont no wont. A ceetidetv liwl see oeonmes as sousciuspi if tyhe rea vile or aehv a sousciuspi aaur.
wiki.article.standard.roleLimit.title: Elro Milit
wiki.article.standard.roleLimit.text:
A lorse milit si eth maxmumi rembun fo thta elro thta nac eb enearetgd ta eth tsrta fo a greurla eagm. If heetr si on milit, heetr nac eb ayn rembun fo thta elro.
- Evnraet sah a elro milit fo 1, heetr nac lyon eb eon evnraet, if 2 pleeop lmaic evnraet, eon usmt eb yling
- Addrliwc usmt ehrade to elro milit
wiki.article.standard.douse.title: Sdeou
wiki.article.standard.douse.text: Srssioant nac sdeou lyrpeas, tehn etrla eitgni, to taktca oeneryev woh si usodde. If heetr si na stnosrai aevil tehn usodde lyrpeas aehv a sousciuspi aaur. Ignigtni si na ncdeirit, egcctetoiiirprpn-no taktca to lla usodde lyrpeas.
wiki.article.standard.spiral.title: Lrispa
wiki.article.standard.spiral.text: MUIZKUA nac iutafaent lyrpeas, hhciw caeuss meht to lrispa. Sailpignr lyrpeas rea ont odtl tyhe rea sailpignr, nad tyhe die eth extn igtnh. Otrsvisi to sailpignr lyrpeas tsrta to lrispa. Dgyni due to sailpignr si na ncdeirit, eaigrrmro-cpin taktca.
wiki.article.standard.backup.title: Ubkcap
wiki.article.standard.backup.text:
Eth iacendyts nac hoecso a rlpeya to eb eth ubkcap. If lla eth iacendyts lgiikln aitseilib rea bkedclo, tehn eth ubkcap stactka ehirt ttgear esnidta esnidta.
- Eth ubkcap nac eectls a efntrfdei ttgear fmor eth oethr lgiikln yitialb
- Eth oethr lgiikln yitialb cuold eb a iacendyts lgiikln elro or a rlpeya wiht eth ung
wiki.article.standard.confused.title: Efndsuoc
wiki.article.standard.confused.text:
Eth elro fo a rlpeya woh si efndsuoc mgthi ont cniuntof eylcortrc. Efndsuoc scfftae ahce elro ietrefdynfl. Oyu mgthi ont eb odtl thta oyu rea efndsuoc.
 Owh hsti scfftae vryee elro:
   - Onops: Oyu rea ywsaal odtl thta oyu 'ntac tell
   - Ceetidetv: Oyu rea ywsaal odtl oitcennn
   - Slopiherpoh: Oyu rea ywsaal odtl irfsden
   - Gspsoi: Oyu rea ywsaal odtl thta yuor ttgear ddi'tn vsiit na nyeem
   - Sccyphi: Oyu rea odtl a rdanmo ilst fo 3 lyrpeas rof yuor vile oisnvi, Oyu rea odtl a rdanmo ilst fo 2 lyrpeas rof yuor odgo oisnvi.
 - Atlyl Kcelr: Oyu rea odtl ihtere 1 more or 1 slse tnha eth ccrreto rembun oyu uhdols eb odtl. If ti wdoul eedexc eth rembun fo lyrpeas woh tevdo tgiluy, ti si thta rembun esnidta. If ti rewe to go uredn 0, ti si 0 esnidta.
 - Utarido: Oyu tge rdanmo lorse, tyhe mgthi eb ccrreto or rorcecnit. Oyu rea lyon odtl lorse thta cuold aehv moec fmor thta slto.
wiki.article.standard.marionette.title: Risgnt Up
wiki.article.standard.marionette.text:
A rlpeya woh si a aiomtetner sah doienj a efntrfdei etma
- Tyhe kpee ehirt dol elro wenh tyhe bmocee a aiomtetner
- Tyhe rea aacktted vryee igtnh yb eth elro thta rceeirudt meht wiht a pictotoren rniigcep taktca(XE. Ueertrcir or Eupteperp)
- If heetr rea on lyrpeas wiht eth elro thta rceeirudt meht, eth aiomtetner si lsitl aacktted
- Eth aiomtetner on lgreno wins wiht ehirt oaliigrn etma tbu wins wiht eth new etma esnidta
wiki.article.standard.aura.title: Aaur
wiki.article.standard.aura.text:
Na aaur si a staust eeftcf ptu no a rlpeya thta caeuss meht to ierregts ietrefdynfl to vativenietgsi aitseilib.
 - Rof elamxpe, a Ceetidetv eses ayn lyrpeas wiht a sousciuspi aaur as einesme to wont, enve if tyhe rea irfsden wiht wont
 - To kwno owh oitcennn aaur or sousciuspi aaur mgthi eeftcf na yitialb, to go eth luanma gape rof thta elro.

 Ehre rea xeemplsa fo aitseilib thta mgthi sceua a rlpeya to aehv na aaur.
 - Arerfm evgis a rlpeya sousciuspi aaur rof a igtnh
 - Rtahofsged aehv na oitcennn aaur, enve if ther'ey elcrkboledo
 - Isdsiegur nac give a rlpeya na oitcennn aaur rof eon igtnh

If a rlpeya sah bhot na oitcennn nad sousciuspi aaur ta eth msea miet, eth sousciuspi aaur *ysualul* irvdosree.
 - A rlpeya wiht na oitcennn aaur nad a sousciuspi aaur stsieegrr as einesme wiht wont igcdrnaoc to a ceetidetv
wiki.article.standard.appearedVisit.text:
A rlpeya cuold aarppe__ to aehv evdiits oeonmes, enve oghthu tyhe ddi'tn. Hsti si ysualul scdeua yb vile lorse hsuc as Arerfm.

Hsti lyon scfftae vativenietgsi lorse.

mL_xsee_pa

Eth Ekrcrta nad Olootku nac see eth ederappa vsiit, tbu ont eth lrae vsiit.

A Evnraet ntdos'e taktca a rlpeya woh ederappa to vsiit meht nad ddi'tn latculay vsiit meht.
wiki.article.standard.roleOutline.title: Elro Noueitl
wiki.article.standard.roleOutline.text:
A elro noueitl eiefdns a ogrpu fo lorse.

Lusotien nac ihtere eb a ifrdeepden elro ste, na actxe elro, or a ionnu fo ulimptel.

mL_xsee_pa

"Ayn" Ti cuold eb ayn elro

"Etalunr" Cuold eb ayn soblisep etalunr elro.

"Wont Upposrt" Cuold eb na Otsrec, Iiostrtrnebtiu, Arrorttesnp, or Uedmmi

"Hagodfter" Cuold lyon eb a Hagodfter.

"Addrliwc ∪ Sccyphi" Cuold ihtere eb na Addrliwc or Sccyphi.

- Wenh lorse rea enearetgd dmonrlay fmor a elro noueitl, ahce soblisep elro si luelqay ylkeli to neeegtra.
- Elro lusotien rea used ni eth noueitl ilst to wohs thaw lorse cuold eb ni eth eagm.
wiki.article.standard.outlineList.title: Noueitl Ilst
wiki.article.standard.outlineList.text:
Eth noueitl ilst eiefdns thaw lorse rea ni eth eagm. Wenh eth eagm ststra:
- Ahce elro noueitl teegaenrs a rdanmo elro fmor eth lorse ni eth noueitl
- Ahce rlpeya si sgaensid to a elro noueitl, nad rthrfeeoe a elro.
wiki.article.standard.chatGroup.title: Thac Ogrpu
wiki.article.standard.chatGroup.text:
Lla sgmesase rea ihtere raetvpi or etns eon fo tehse thac guopsr
 - Lla 🔊 (Eth coni ntdos'e spaiyld extn to sgmesase, Oyu rea lalodwe to espka out duol if oyu nac nsed to "Lla" thac) 
 - Aedd 💀
 - Iacendyts 🌹
 - Ctlu 🕯️
 - Laij 🔒
 - Ivneriwte 📝

 Lyrpeas nac eb ni ulimptel thac guopsr ta ocne, or enve drea thac guopsr tyhe rea ont ni.
 - 🔇 Saenm oyu rea ont ni eth "Lla" thac ogrpu nad rea *ont lalodwe to espka out duol*
 - 🔮 saenm thta a nilvig rlpeya etns a ssgeema to eth aedd thac ogrpu
 - ✉️ saenm thta eth ssgeema swa etns ylivtarpe
wiki.article.standard.fastForward.title: Ftas Arofrwd
wiki.article.standard.fastForward.text: If lla nilvig lyrpeas tove to ftas arofrwd, eth rtecrun shaep alnsiytnt sedn. Itvgon to ftas arofrwd si yleteclpmo ynnaoosum, bdoyon enve nsokw wenh oyu pssre eth tuobtn. To tove to ftas arofrwd, pssre eth ftas arofrwd tuobtn ni eth opt lfet.
wiki.article.standard.forfeitVote.title: Fireoft Atoninmnio Tove
wiki.article.standard.forfeitVote.text:
Feitirfogn yuor tove saenm oyu rea ont aelb to tove grunid eth atoninmnio shaep tbu oyu nac lsitl tove grunid eth eugejnmdt shaep. Grunid scdoinsius, lyrpeas nac hoecso to fireoft ehirt tove snigu eth tuobtn ta eth opt fo eth tlsrpailey. Ocne Atoninmnio ststra, tyhe 'ntac hgneca ehirt mdin.
- Oeneryev nrsela woh frotefeid ehirt tove wenh atoninmnio ststra ni eth rmfo fo a agt
- Rof ahce rlpeya woh iesfoftr ehirt tove, eth uoantm fo evsto dneeed rof a iarlt asesreecd lnaygdcicro
- Lyrpeas woh rea iencsdel rea fedroc to fireoft ehirt tove

 Ti si oyrgltsn mecdronedem to nvree erev fireoft yuor tove snulse oyu rea iencsdel or gtdniepern to eb iencsdel
wiki.article.standard.loveLinked.title: Vole Nikl
wiki.article.standard.loveLinked.text: 2 lyrpeas woh rea vole dnelki rea odtl woh ahce oethr rea. If eon ieds, eth oethr ieds fo a nreobk hater. Duipc nac vole nikl lyrpeas. So nac eth vole nikl eagm imefodir.
wiki.article.standard.howToPlay.title: Owh To Aylp
wiki.article.standard.howToPlay.text:
Eth aglo fo eth eagm dpdsene no yuor elro. Mots lorse wni if lla lyrpeas fmor gopnisop taems rea ainltedime
Eth taems rea Wont, Iacendyts, Ctlu, Dfsine
- Wont uhdols rty to ndif out woh eth iacendyts si ni oerrd to tove meht out
- Iacendyts, ctlu, nad dfsine, uhdols rty to yast ddienh lwieh lgiikln onwsiet

Eth eagm srnu ni passeh fo ayd nad igtnh
- Grunid igtnh, ahce rlpeya uess ehirt lorse aitseilib
- Grunid eth ayd, lyrpeas sidsusc antrfimooni tyhe dleraen nad tove no a rlpeya to llik

Heetr rea ssbphsaue hntiiw ayd nad igtnh

# Igtnh
Mots elro aitseilib rokw ta igtnh. Ehre rea mose xeemplsa
- Ahce igtnh, eth hagodfter nac eectls a rlpeya to llik meht
- Ahce igtnh, eth ceetidetv nac eectls a rlpeya. Eth ceetidetv si odtl if eth rlpeya tyhe eectls si oitcennn or sousciuspi. Hsti wdoul hlep eth ceetidetv ndif out woh eth iacendyts si. If tyhe rea sousciuspi tyhe rea a wont nyeem
- Ahce igtnh, eth arerfm nac eectls a rlpeya to mkae meht ierregts ealylsf to eth ceetidetv. So a wnioet cuold ierregts as sousciuspi to a ceetidetv ealylsf if a arerfm used ehirt yitialb

# Uiboytar
Grunid eth uiboytar shaep, oeneryev si odtl woh ided, anolg wiht eth elro nad bliai fo eshot woh ided.
Lla lyrpeas uhdols kpee ehirt bliai toen gape to kpee acrkt fo lla eth antrfimooni tyhe dleraen grunid eth eagm. Eth uiboytar shaep si a ercfpte miet to ertiw ndow ni yuor bliai thaw oyu dleraen tlas igtnh. Rof elamxpe:

- If yo'eur a ceetidetv woh dleraen thta @5 si sousciuspi no igtnh 1. Oyu cuold ertiw yuor bliai to kool liek hsti

Ceetidetv
Igtnh 1: @5 - sousciuspi

Ti si lsoa mtptorani rof nno wnioet lyrpeas to kpee a fake bliai to detenpr thta tyhe rea a wnioet

# Scdoinsius
Eth scdoinsius shaep si hweer lyrpeas sidsusc eth antrfimooni tyhe dleraen nad rty to ndif out woh eth iacendyts, dfsine, nad ctlu rea
Lyrpeas liwl kas ahce oethr to lmaic, hsti saenm tyhe wnat to kwno eth antrfimooni thta eth oethr rlpeya dleraen
Mots lyrpeas nsed ehirt bliai ni thac grunid hsti shaep, to sarhe eth antrfimooni icenyleitff ni eorenpss to eigbn ksaed to lmaic. Ti liwl ylkeli eb nresdcedio sousciuspi to ont aehv na bliai eraprdep wenh ksaed rof eon. So tis yerv mtptorani to aehv eon eraprdep, on remtta woh oyu rea

# Atoninmnio
Grunid atoninmnio, lyrpeas nac tove oethr lyrpeas no to iarlt ni oerrd to tueeecx meht
Eth ebts yaw rof onwsiet to llik iacendyts esmbmer si to seu ehirt tove, enve if oyu rena’t itrncae oeonmes si vile, itvgon meht noto iarlt nad gnatrehntei meht liwl onfte give antrfimooni to hlep ndif iacendyts
- If more tnha hfla fo eth nilvig lyrpeas tove rof eon rlpeya, thta rlpeya si ptu no iarlt
- If heetr rena’t gnehuo evsto ni miet, eth eagm spsik tlyercdi to udsk

# Ymsitnote
- Eth rlpeya tevdo no rltia si eth lyon rlpeya lalodwe to espka nad thac grunid hsti shaep, tyhe uhdols yntraicle lmaic, nsed ehirt bliai nad ays thaw ehirt elro si

# Eugejnmdt
- Oeneryev evsto oitcennn or tgiluy (or atsnbisa)
- If more lyrpeas tove tgiluy tnha oitcennn, eth rlpeya no iarlt liwl eb ceuexetd
- If eth rlpeya no iarlt sin’t ceuexetd, heetr si notahre rltia (wiht a amx fo ehter)

# Nflai wdosr
- Eth rlpeya woh swa no iarlt uhdols eb lalodwe to ays mose nflai wdosr or eston tyhe aehv rof eth wont

# Udsk
- A ri-hpnetg shaep rof oeneryev to tge a tlas owdr ni eoferb eth extn igtnh

# Nflai gusothth
Eth eagm srnu ni hsti lpoo itlun heetr si eon etma ngieairnm
Eth itimhgdn luanma sah a ilst fo lla lorse nad ehirt aitseilib. Ti si mecdronedem to drea up no yuor elro grunid eth nnieggnbi bnriiefg shaep
If yuor vile, oyu uhdols rty to ealrn owh ta ealts eon wnioet elro wkros so oyu nac detenpr to eb thta elro
Etalunr lorse lla aehv efntrfdei wni ndstocniio nad rea ont no a etma. Rof elamxpe: Eesjrt wins if tyhe rea tevdo out grunid a rltia
wiki.article.standard.priority.title: Ptoiriyr
wiki.article.standard.priority.text:
Ta eth nde fo igtnh yanm aitseilib pphnea ta nerayl eth msea miet. Tyhe pphnea ni a cpseiifc oerrd clldea ptoiriyr. Nngiwok eth oerrd fo mose tgsihn nac hlep sdagnrnutndie fo mose eagm cascemihn.
Hsti si eth egnelar ptoiriyr oerrd, wiht mose oiaidldnta eston:
- OroYptritip
- Drwa
    - Ourencb, Oacsecrwr, Npaedrkpi, Jroail, nad Ardwne lla drwa ehre
- Arrorttesnp
- Raewrp
- Pssoses
    - Ihcwt etgs nedsco vsiit etddlee ehre
- Lecobkrlo
    - Pyiohtstn nad Otsrec go ehre
- Ptcednioe
    - Efrrgo, Arerfm, Ikbermcaall go ehre
    - Arerfm etgs eth nedsco vsiit etddlee ehre
    - Iacendyts ubkcap vsiit si deasre if eth lgiikln si bkedclo
- Ruodybgda
    - Ruodybgda moesv eth cngkaitat vsiit to eb twdaosr etslehmf
- Ealh
    - Eopctreivt lorse liek Otrodc nad Mrmihrtsoa go ehre
- Llik
- Nrcvote
    - Wni oinonicdt nhgaces go ehre
- Iosnpo
- Vativenietgsi
    - Lorse liek Ceetidetv, Onops, Olootku, nad Spy go ehre
- Duipc
- GsuBpy
- SaeegTsaesslm
    - Ihcwt laetss sgmesase
wiki.article.standard.chat.title: Thac
wiki.article.standard.chat.text:
Eth thac si hweer lyrpeas civreee mots antrfimooni.
- Wenh igtnh sedn, eth thac liwl wohs if oyu rewe aacktted, elcrkboledo, aostetdrnpr nad uchm more.
- Ysualul, lyrpeas 'ntac nsed sgmesase ta igtnh, tbu mose lorse nac.
- Ont lla sgmesase nac eb eens yb oeneryev, lnraom sgmesase aehv isnco thta eeretsnpr thaw thac ogrpu eth ssgeema swa etns ni.
wiki.article.standard.playerList.title: Lyrpeas
wiki.article.standard.playerList.text:
Eth rlpeya ilst unem psailsyd lla eth lyrpeas ni eth eagm. Ti alwosl oyu to do eth ofnllwiog: 
 - Vwie nilvig nad aedd lyrpeas
- Vwie eth vgresa fo aedd lyrpeas
- Vwie eth eston sagep nad bailsi fo lyrpeas
- Litref thac sgmesase yb lyrpeas
- Ishewpr to lyrpeas
- Vwie rlpeya asgt nad eervelad lorse
wiki.article.standard.alibi.title: Bliai
wiki.article.standard.alibi.text:
Ni oerrd to ndif out woh eth iacendyts si, onwsiet ndee to sarhe antrfimooni tyhe aehv ni oerrd to cuddee woh si yling oatbu ehirt elro. Hsti si deon wiht eth seu fo bailsi, hhciw rea drorecs fo eth aitseilib oyu aehv used nad antrfimooni oyu aehv hragdtee. Bailsi rea tdespo ni eth thac nad agryrdvea wenh eth rlpeya ieds. Ehre si na elamxpe fo a paitcly bliai thta a Ceetidetv wdoul aehv.

> Ceetidetv
Igtnh 1: Ateddo Saonwl - Oitcennn
Igtnh 2: Sulaem Psarir - Sousciuspi

Wenh eth Ceetidetv sotsp hsti bliai ni thac, tyhe drvioep divecnee to oethr lyrpeas thta no eth nedsco igtnh, tyhe ondfu Sulaem Psarir as sousciuspi, ygilpmni thta Sulaem Psarir si a iacendyts eemmrb. If eth wont elevsibe eth Ceetidetv, tyhe liwl ylkeli tove eth sousciuspi rlpeya out.

Rof a iacendyts eemmrb to detenpr to eb a wont elro, tyhe ndee to ertiw a fake bliai to eblnd ni wiht eth wont lorse. f_I A RLPEYA EOSD ONT AEHV NA BLIAI, TYHE REA YLKELI A IACENDYTS _MMERBe woh ntdos'e kwno owh to ertiw a fake bliai, nad tyhe uhdols eb citeerdd to hsti gape.
wiki.article.standard.gameMode.title: Oegmdame
wiki.article.standard.gameMode.text:
Eth eagm doem unem slet oyu kpee acrkt fo eth eagm tisestgn grunid eth eagm.
- Noueitl ilst
- Banelde Lorse
- Banelde Ifeodsmri
wiki.article.modifier.obscuredGraves.tex: Reoscubd Vgresa si a eagm imefodir thta masek ti so lla vgresa rea reoscubd.
wiki.article.modifier.randomLoveLinks.te: Rdanmo Vole Kilsn si a eagm imefodir thta masek ti so lla lyrpeas rea vole dnelki to a rdanmo rlpeya. Eth eagm si ste up hsuc thta lla lyrpeas rea vole dnelki to ta ealts 1 oethr rlpeya, nad ta mots 1 rlpeya si vole dnelki to more tnha 1 oethr rlpeya.
wiki.article.modifier.skipDay1.title: Pkis Ayd 1
wiki.article.modifier.skipDay1.text: Pkis Ayd 1 si a eagm imefodir. Lwieh vdtacitea: Lla passeh fmor Udsk 1 to Nflai Wdosr 2 rea ftas rrdwdefao, elceyteivff agrnttsi eth eagm ta Udsk 2 esnidta.
wiki.article.modifier.deadCanChat.title: Aedd Nac Thac
wiki.article.modifier.deadCanChat.text: Aedd Nac Thac si a eagm imefodir thta nhgaces eth eagm hsuc thta aedd lyrpeas nac lsitl seu thcas as if tyhe rewe aevil. Aedd lyrpeas nac ont ishewpr or eb iedrwhpes to.
wiki.article.modifier.scheduledNominatio:
Ecdlhseud Itmnannsooi si a eagm imefodir thta nhgaces eth eagm hsuc thta atoninmnio si spilt nito 3 dtianiecl rpesaaet passeh.

- Ta eth nde fo a atoninmnio shaep (wenh miet srnu out), erovweh sah eth mots evsto si ptu to iarlt.
    - If heetr si a tei, bdoyon si ptu to iarlt
    - If eth rlpeya wiht eth mots evsto dteosn aehv ta ealts eth mminuim evsto iqeredru rof a iarlt, bdoyon si ptu to iarlt
    - If bdoyon si ptu to iarlt, eth eagm spsik to eth extn atoninmnio shaep, or if heetr rea on iarstl lfet, eth eagm spsik to udsk
- Erfat a rlpeya si tevdo tgiluy, nad ehirt iarlt sedn, eth eagm spsik to udsk
wiki.article.modifier.noAbstaining.title: On Isainnbatg
wiki.article.modifier.noAbstaining.text: On Isainnbatg si a eagm imefodir thta nhgaces eth eagm hsuc thta on lyrpeas nac nibtaas grunid eugejnmdt. Ti liwl udfatel to itvgon oitcennn esnidta fo nidlagetuf to isainnbatg.
wiki.article.modifier.noDeathCause.title: On Hetda Sceua
wiki.article.modifier.noDeathCause.text: On Hetda Sceua si a eagm imefodir thta nhgaces eth eagm hsuc thta vryee agver eosd ont aehv a hetda sceua stiled.
wiki.article.modifier.autoGuilty.title: -gloyIatutu
wiki.article.modifier.autoGuilty.text: -gloyIatutu si a eagm imefodir thta nhgaces eth eagm hsuc thta vryee maiotnnde rlpeya liwl eb ceuexetd thtoiuw eugejnmdt.
Trhwstid-o Otamyrji si a eagm imefodir thta nhgaces eth eagm hsuc thta grunid atoninmnio nad eugejnmdt, a trhwstid-o otamyrji (ndeurod up) si iqeredru, earrth tnha a iespml otamyrji.
wiki.article.modifier.noTrialPhases.text: On Iarlt Passeh si a eagm imefodir thta nhgaces eth eagm hsuc thta eth iarlt passeh Atoninmnio, Ymsitnote, nad Eugejnmdt on lgreno pphnea.
wiki.article.modifier.noWhispers.title: On Srhspeiw
wiki.article.modifier.noWhispers.text: On Srhspeiw si a eagm imefodir thta nhgaces eth eagm hsuc thta on lyrpeas nac ishewpr ahce oethr.
wiki.article.modifier.hiddenWhispers.tex: Ddienh Srhspeiw si a eagm imefodir thta nhgaces eth eagm hsuc thta srhspeiw rea ont eardodcabst.
wiki.article.modifier.noNightChat.title: On Igtnh Thac
wiki.article.modifier.noNightChat.text: On Igtnh Thac si a eagm imefodir thta nhgaces eth eagm hsuc thta lla nilvig lyrpeas ncnoat nsed sgmesase grunid igtnh - enve if tyhe rea rapt fo na inedirs ogrpu.
wiki.article.modifier.noChat.title: On Thac
wiki.article.modifier.noChat.text: On Thac si a eagm imefodir thta nhgaces eth eagm hsuc thta on lyrpeas nac nsed sgmesase.
wiki.article.standard.syndicateGunItem.t:
Iacendyts Ung si na yitialb a iacendyts eemmrb etgs wenh tesreh on iacendyts lgiikln elro enrestp
- A iacendyts eemmrb si vngie a ung tyhe nac seu to llik a rlpeya wiht a csiab taktca ta igtnh
- Eth ung 'ntac eb used no eth strfi igtnh
- Eth ung nac eb paesds oudnra nebwtee iacendyts esmbmer, so a efntrfdei iacendyts eemmrb nac ohost ti vryee igtnh
- Eth ung lsitl uess stiisv, so ttnigeg elcrkboledo lsitl essare thta vsiit, nad sttpsrraon lsitl moev ti
- Eth rlekil aeppsra to eb iacendyts no eth agver fo eth rlpeya woh ided to eth ung
syndicateGunItem.description: Hoecso a rlpeya to ohost wiht eth iacendyts ung. Or hoecso to give ti to notahre iacendyts inedirs.
wiki.article.standard.nobody.title: Bdoyon
wiki.article.standard.nobody.text: Bdoyon saenm bdoyon. If oyu aehv huerfrt esqiunsto, lesaep ndif na gneslhi rtcoiadyni.
wiki.article.standard.vfr.title: Of-roVeorElt-
wiki.article.standard.vfr.text: Tove rof elro si eth eamn fo a ommonc egayrtst. Lyrpeas liwl hoecso a rlpeya nad erfco meht to lmaic uredn eth ettrah fo ttnigeg tevdo out. If thta rlpeya aismlc tyhe liwl ylkeli eb easrdp. Ysualul heetr si ont uchm fo a anrseo why a cpseiifc rlpeya si oecnhs, eth egayrtst si onfte used to tjus tge agrnttsi antrfimooni.
wiki.article.standard.claim.title: Lmaic
wiki.article.standard.claim.text: Wenh a rlpeya kssa oyu to lmaic. Tyhe rea ylkeli ngksia oyu to ays thaw yuor elro si, nad nsed yuor bliai ni thac. Hsti si ont einslyscaer baecues tyhe hintk yuor vile, tbu tyhe wnat antrfimooni fmor oyu.
wiki.article.standard.claimswap.title: Lmaic pasw
wiki.article.standard.claimswap.text: Wenh 2 lyrpeas do a lmaic pasw, tyhe rea bhot aincimgl ahce trheso lorse. Ojnh Ctropor si aincimgl eernngie enve oghthu Ateddo Saonwl si eernngie, nad Ateddo Saonwl si aincimgl ceetidetv enve gththuo Ojnh Ctropor si ceetidetv. Hsti si ni oerrd to dhie antrfimooni fmor vile lyrpeas lwieh lsitl vggnii antrfimooni to wont. A oyemsraod or riak nac yalise llik a olt fo onwsiet if tyhe kwno eth actxe lorse fo onwsiet. Lmaic pasw mgthi hlep a evnraet llik vile lyrpeas.
wiki.article.standard.passcode.title: Oeaspdsc
wiki.article.standard.passcode.text:
A oeaspdsc si a coed thta a rlpeya masek up nad evgis to notahre rlpeya to ndif antrfimooni.
Rof elamxpe:
Soupeps @4 aismlc tyhe rea a cnsoaiwx (Lyrpeas wiht eth cnsoaiwx elro nac thac wiht aedd lyrpeas).
@2 srhspeiw to @3 nsgayi "Eth cnsoaiwx oeaspdsc si 1423"
 If @4 rlelya si a cnsoaiwx, wenh @2 ieds, @2 uhdols tell @4 eth oeaspdsc.
 If @4 sit'n aelb to tell @3 thta eth oeaspdsc si "1423", tehn @4 s'tnaw aelb to latk wiht @2 nad rthrfeeoe sit'n a cnsoaiwx.
wiki.article.standard.shwompt.title: Ospwthm
wiki.article.standard.shwompt.text:
Ospwthm 
Rtncuininooap: ʃmwɒpt 
A uensdd nghswihoo nouds thta snnoaitc a lsnibtai slcuinncoo. Hsti ssriebced eth nouds thta si dmea wenh jbcsteo shaep uhohgrt a oidls wlla. 
Oethr froms: Ompshtewr, Nhitgwomsp, Poetsmhwd, Twemhosep
